item.title: Consolidated My Blogs
item.description: I finally consolidate my blogs that were located at: http://jason.lostechies.com - old posts http://blog.jasonmeridth.com - current posts and unified them here. I also decided to move to Nikola since I’m coding in Python full-time now and it is a nice Python Static Site Generator. New posts and theme changes coming soon.
